summary: The ReConnecting Rural America Act of 2025 aims to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to establish a ReConnect program. This program will provide grants, loans, and combined grants and loans to expand broadband internet access in rural areas. The bill defines "rural areas," sets broadband service standards, outlines eligibility criteria for entities seeking funding, specifies funding authorization, and sets a termination date for the program. It also addresses existing funding and additional loan provisions for rural broadband programs.
